data.description:
FREE vertical slice demo of Shotwood. Smash deadly wooden targets with realistic firearms & explosives while you try to escape from this ominous, ridiculous, mysterious facility. Shotwood is the casual (yet satisfyingly tactical) shoot-house themed game!

DEMO FEATURES

 - Awesome Shotwood gunplay
 - Immediate access to some guns
 - Sidearm camera, hand grenades
 - Full practice range
 - 2 shoot-house assessments
 - Some challenges and modes
 - Hidden cashwads to find
 - Attachments to unlock and buy
 - Balloon Stabber minigame
 - Home hub area
 - 35 ridiculous announcements
 - A secret demo area to discover!

TECHNICAL FEATURES

 - 90hz refresh rate (Quest 2+)
 - Full roomscale support
 - Seated play support
 - Left handed support
 - Captions
 - Locomotion options
 - Solo / offline

FULL GAME FEATURES (NOT IN DEMO)

 - All 8 shoot-house assessments
 - Full challenge board
 - Full access to all modes
 - Full arsenal of 20+ firearms
 - Kamikaze drones
 - Augmented visor
 - Even more Tactical Tools
 - Both minigame floors
 - SimpleJack arcade cabinet
 - Facility induction
 - Progression system
 - Functional grievance booth
 - Big secret area, beyond the booth
 - More story / lore to uncover
 - Full 120 random announcements
 - Multiple save slots
 - Difficulty options
 - Permadeath option
 - New game plus
 - And even more!

Looking for a tactical room clearing sim? A fast-paced action shooter? A casual, unusual, indie-game to explore? Shotwood has you covered! Grab this FREE demo right now and... SHOOT SOME WOOD!
